article_title: Letter: Access to birth control critical for women

article_metadata.description: More than half of pregnancies in Illinois are unintended. Yet state legislators are trying to deny women the promise of birth control coverage under the Affordable Care Act. Planned Parenthood is working to ensure women in Illinois can continue to have access to the best information available and to choose the best method of birth control for themselves. Young women — and men — can talk confidentially with a Planned Parenthood professional, who will give them correct and
